entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
